snippet: Seattle’s rookie quarterback Russell Wilson emerged from last Sunday’s playoff loss with his reputation enhanced.
abstract: Keeping Score column; Seattle Seahawks rookie quarterback Russell Wilson cemented his star status by playing well in post-season loss to Atlanta Falcons; Wilson became the seventh quarterback to throw for 300 yards and rush for 50 in a playoff game,  nearly completing the biggest fourth-quarter comeback in NFL playoff history.
lead_paragraph: Seattle’s rookie quarterback Russell Wilson emerged from last Sunday’s playoff loss with his reputation enhanced.

headline.seo: Russell Wilson, Seattle Rookie Quarterback, Wins by Losing
